name: Bat-Kour
description:
We are game dev students and this was a project we had to do for our unity class! Its a parkour game based on batman, and we only had 20 days to work on it.

All materials and assets are made by me and my classmates except the music.

Who worked on this? 

Layan Metanes

Liron Rotman

Alon Shani

music artists:

Chase by Alexander Nakarada
Hostiles Inbound by Miguel Johnson
In Dreams by Scott Buckley

Gun sound effects by mixkit.
